branchCategory.name: AR
branchCategory.description: <p>Regulator&nbsp;series 90-AR offer various pressure range settings to accommodate most applications.&nbsp; 90-AR is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The locking adjustment knob prevents accidental setting changes.&nbsp; The modular design of the 90-AR series connects with other SMC air preparation equipment.</p>

branchItem.name: 90-AR10-60, Modular Style Regulator
branchItem.description: <p>Regulator series 90-AR offer various pressure range settings to accommodate most applications.  90-AR is made from materials compatible with secondary battery manufacturing. The locking adjustment knob prevents accidental setting changes.  The modular design of the 90-AR series connects with other SMC air preparation equipment.</p>
